message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more since the value decreases for me over time.
I think we can be fairer than that.  This offer is closer to what I think is equitable, considering the inflation factor.
Bob, my offer is still the most fair considering the inflation. I'm willing to meet you halfway though.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to ensure a greater share given the inflation affecting your portion of the money.
